content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: grindstone
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 25, "index": 12}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 54, "index": 13}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 43, "index": 29}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 25, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 28, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "vex_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 40}, {"type": "blue_terracotta", "quantity": 50, "index": 43}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a grindstone, I need to craft birch_planks first. The birch_planks can be crafted from stripped_birch_wood which is currently in slot 38. Therefore, I will move the stripped_birch_wood from slot 38 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: grindstone
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 10}, {"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 25, "index": 12}, {"type": "powered_rail", "quantity": 54, "index": 13}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 43, "index": 29}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 25, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 28, "index": 36}, {"type": "vex_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 40}, {"type": "blue_terracotta", "quantity": 50, "index": 43}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I have crafted the birch_planks, I can move them to a free slot (eg., slot 11)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
